pages.text: it is not enough for a good samurai to only have a Sharpness White Blade.$(br)Any Blade lover knows that only in its Blade set can a Blade fully shows its excellence.$(br2)If you want a better blade, you may smith a better one to replace the old blade.
Kill 100 creatures then break the Blade, and it will turn into a mysterious Sheath, which is a necessary to make high-tier Blades.

At this point you have acknowledged the basic Blade smithing techniques.$(br2)You have become a capable smith. However, practising it over and over again is the only way to improve your skill.$(br)Then I will not teach you anything about smithing. I would like to talk about my stories...
